Distribute Mobile Coupons to VanDeal

About Wechat


WeChat is the #1 social media platform in China. Over 900 million Chinese use it. 90% of Chinese in Vancouver is using this social media platform.Most of them spent more than 3 hours on Wechat to connect with others and get more information.



About VanDeal


VanDeal is a WeChat channel. VanDeal posts Vancouver’s local stores and big chain store’s discount information daily. Now “VanDeal” has over 6000 subscribers and growing. All subscribers are Chinese living in Vancouver.
We provide a win-win for both shops and Chinese in Vancouver. Chinese in Vancouver can shop more smartly and shops can get more revenue.

VanDeal Subscribers Profile



75% female
90% aged from 19 to 45

Why Choose Advertising on VanDeal?

Price Smart

If you want to deliver your message to Chinese in Vancouver, advertising on VanDeal will be price smart choice.

Precision

Most of our subscribers are Chinese women in Vancouver. In Chinese culture, women are the decision-makers in the family. Your promotion messages will be delivered to 6000 decision-makers.

Influence

6000 subscribers. Every month over 51,000 reads (WeChat official statistics).

Purchase Ready

The intention of our subscribers is to spend money. They want to spend it in a smart way. They are purchase ready.

Deals feed AD

Your ads will be a deal to subscribers, which will increase the response rate significantly.
If you want to reach chinese in Vancouver, Advertising with VanDeal. A smart and effective choice.

Issue Mobile Coupon to VanDeal subscriber Program


1. Issue 6000 mobile coupon to VanDeal Subscriber reach to their finger tips.
2. A sponsored article to get Chinese in Vancouver knows your business and engage them to use your coupon.


How it works

  • Prepare your mobile coupon and brief introduction of your business and this deal.
  • We will help you design mobile coupon and writing your store into chinese.
  • Issue 6000 mobile coupons
  • Post your store to all subscribers once.
  • You redeem the mobile coupon to track how successful of this campaign.

The pricing

$0.05 per subscriber per campaign.
